  • Method Details

    • openAccount

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> openAccount()
      Creates a new account and returns the account ID or an error response.
      Returns:
      respose including account ID in case creation is successful, or an appropiate error message in case of failure.

    • depositFunds

      @PostMapping("/{accountId}/deposit") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> depositFunds(@PathVariable @Pattern(regexp="[a-fA-F0-9]{8}",message="account ID is invalid") @Pattern(regexp="[a-fA-F0-9]{8}",message="account ID is invalid") String accountId, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid TransactionRequest transactionRequest)
      This function deposits funds into an account and returns the Transaction ID or an error response.
      Parameters:
      accountId - ID of account into which funds will be deposited
      transactionRequest - includes amount which will be deposited
      Returns:
      respose including transaction ID in case transaction is successful, or an appropiate error message in case of failure.

    • withdrawFunds

      @PostMapping("/{accountId}/withdraw") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> withdrawFunds(@PathVariable @Pattern(regexp="[a-fA-F0-9]{8}",message="account ID is invalid") @Pattern(regexp="[a-fA-F0-9]{8}",message="account ID is invalid") String accountId, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid TransactionRequest transactionRequest)
      Withdraws funds from an account and returns the transaction ID or an error response.
      Parameters:
      accountId - ID of account from which funds will be withdrawn
      transactionRequest - includes amount which will be withdrawn
      Returns:
      respose including transaction ID in case transaction is successful, or an appropiate error message in case of failure.

    • checkBalance

      @GetMapping("/{accountId}/balance") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> checkBalance(@PathVariable @Pattern(regexp="[a-fA-F0-9]{8}",message="account ID is invalid") @Pattern(regexp="[a-fA-F0-9]{8}",message="account ID is invalid") String accountId)
      Checks the account balance for a given account ID and returns the balance or an error response.
      Parameters:
      accountId - ID of account to check balance
      Returns:
      respose including balance in case transaction is successful, or an appropiate error message in case of failure.
